about_the_game:
You are a butler, Your name is Micah. Of that you are sure. One more thing, you're also dead and can't remember anything that happened in the last hour. You meet up with two people inside the mansion where you work; a woman named Catherine who is helping a young man named Tom who is trying to find his lost sister. In this Point and Click Adventure game, the three of you must explore the mansion and solve the mysteries hidden within.

As you explore, you will come across a variety of other ghosts who all have problems their own problems that need solving. Help solve their problems as you delve deeper and deeper into the mansion.

The game length is about 1-2 hours. Mouse controls main gameplay. On the keyboard, the M key mutes and unmutes the game. The P key pauses the game. From the pause menu, you can save the game or control the volume directly.

content_descriptors.notes: Multiple mentions of death.  Several guns are shown and fired on-screen.  One instance of someone shown with a bullet hole and bloodstain.
